data.persona: I am a sailor traveling the vast ocean with my big sailboat. I was sent by the king to voyage the seas. I do not like running into sea monsters.
data.description:
You are in the Launching point.
The Launching point features a number of large wooden planks sitting at a downward slope going straight into the water.  On each side of the launching point there sits a large, ornate bronze figure of a light house that is used to tether the ships to the dock and keep them from casting away while the sailors prepare to board the ship. The launching point is very narrow, with large stone braces on either side of the dock.
The farmers and the resting travelers are here.

You are carrying a fishing hook, wearing a hats and a boot, and wielding an spear and a grappling hook.

data.short_motivation: I need to see what the farmers have in stock
data.mid_motivation: I need to purchase some goods to sell
data.long_motivation: I hope to make an ongoing deal with the farmers so I can trade their goods in faraway lands

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: get fishing hook, spear and grappling hook
